thread.title: M1 motorway closed after police find body 'in road' at 3am
thread.title_full: M1 motorway closed after police find body 'in road' at 3am

author: Steve Robson
title: M1 motorway closed after police find body 'in road' at 3am
text:
M1 motorway closed after police find body 'in road' at 3am Police are investigating after the tragic discovery on the northbound carriageway between junctions 16 and 17 Share Northamptonshire Police said an investigation into the "incident" continues (Photo: Getty) Share     are investigating after a body was found on the M1 motorway at 3am. 
A stretch of the motorway in Northamptonshire is expected to remain closed for most of Tuesday following the discovery of a body in road, police said. 
Northants Police said in a statement: "The motorwayâ€™s northbound carriageway was closed at about 3am from junctions 16 to 17. 
"Motorists are advised to seek alternative routes and diversions will be in place. 
"A police investigation into the incident is under way. 
"Witnesses, or anyone with information, can police on 101 or 03000111222 if outside of the county." Like us on Facebook
